level.heading: Reference to plan sponsor.
level.text: In applying this subchapter in the case of health insurance coverage that is made available by a health insurer in the group market to employers only through one or more associations, a reference to "plan sponsor" is deemed, with respect to coverage provided to an employer member of the association, to include a reference to such employer.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-209
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-209, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3301.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Temporary addition of chapter: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3301.01.
